gamerules:
The Rules:
   Scissors cuts paper and decapitates lizard.
   Paper covers rock and disproves Spock.
   Rock smashes scissors and crushes lizard.
   Lizard eats paper and poisons Spock.
   Spock vaporizes rock and destroys scissors.
win condition: The first to 3 wins. Good Luck!
choice: Choose one: Rock (r), Paper (p), Scissors (sc), Lizzard (l), or Spock (sp)
invalidChoice: That is not a valid choice, please try again.
play again: Do you want to play again? (y/n)
display moves: Would you like to display the move history? (y/n)
